OpenSim::Joint

Joint Class Reference

#include <Joint.h>

Inheritance diagram for Joint:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class implementing a Simbody joint.

Author:
Frank C. Anderson, Peter Loan
Version:
1.0

Member Data Documentation

PropertyStr _parentNameProp [protected]

Name of the parent body to which this joint connects its owner body.

std::string& _parentName [protected]

PropertyDblVec3 _locationInParentProp [protected]

Location of the joint in the parent body specified in the parent reference frame.

SimTK::Vec3& _locationInParent [protected]

PropertyDblVec3 _orientationInParentProp [protected]

Orientation of the joint in the parent body specified in the parent reference frame.

Euler XYZ body-fixed rotation angles are used to express the orientation.

SimTK::Vec3& _orientationInParent [protected]

PropertyDblVec3 _locationProp [protected]

Location of the joint in the child body specified in the child reference frame.

For SIMM models, this vector is always the zero vector (i.e., the body reference frame coincides with the joint).

SimTK::Vec3& _location [protected]

PropertyDblVec3 _orientationProp [protected]

Orientation of the joint in the owing body specified in the owning body reference frame.

Euler XYZ body-fixed rotation angles are used to express the orientation.

SimTK::Vec3& _orientation [protected]

PropertyObj _coordinateSetProp [protected]

Set holding the generalized coordinates (q's) that parmeterize this joint.

CoordinateSet& _coordinateSet [protected]

Simbody ID of the body to which this joint belongs.

Body to which this joint belongs.

Body to which this body is attached.

Transform for expressing a vector given in the child frame in the parent fram.

Transform for expressing a vector given in the parent frame in the child frame.
